synopsis.text:
Fourth-in-line for the throne, DX Luccafort, is a young man with a mission to save Marion, the girl he loves, and vanquish the fire dragon that threatens his hometown of Ekariipu. As the son of the great General Luccafort, DX is no stranger to the pressures of his famous last name, but all he truly desires is to win Marion's heart.

Marion, a mysterious girl who resides in the mighty tree that protects Ekariipu, has sealed away the fire dragon, but at a great cost. If her soul gets too close to a human, the dragon will resurrect, putting the land in peril once again.

With his loyal sister Lon and his trusted bodyguard Rokkou by his side, DX embarks on a thrilling adventure to uncover the secrets to freeing Marion and defeating the dragon once and for all. Will DX be able to overcome his fears and fulfill his destiny as a hero? Join him on his journey in Landreaall and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
